item.title: Taste Imperial is a complete scam
item.author: Don Y Ma,
item.description: Before anyone comes at me with their perceived positives of TasteImperial, I’ll have you know that you have been utterly deceived. Commonfolk may be misguided by their SCR breakfasts or the library café ‘food’. But I will dispel these myths them with one simple example: The Granola …

item.title: Hong Kong has bigger problems than Trump
item.author: Don Y Ma,
item.description: You think the US election was the apocalypse? Take a look at Hong Kong. Hong Kong recently had its Legislative Council (LegCo) elections, in which two candidates from the Youngspiration party, Leung and Yau, were elected. It is important to note that their platforms focus heavily on achieving …

item.title: Fishballs to bullets – that escalated quickly
item.author: Don Y Ma,
item.description: Hong Kong experienced a fiery Chinese New Year as protesters and the police clashed on the night of the 7th of February. With 130 people injured and 67 people arrested, one might be surprised to find out that the riots started with fishballs, a popular local snack that could be bought from street …
